Hero.title: Hi, I'm Dominik
Hero.description: I am a 17-year-old programming student. I am from the Czech Republic, focusing on web application development, Swift & SwiftUI apps, game development, and vector graphics.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.imbusDesc: A non-profit initiative focusing on clear information delivery and continuous education through collaborative creation and experimentation.
Projects.clovaDesc: A development studio specializing in the Roblox platform. We deliver top-notch scripts, game assets, and complex systems combining precision with high modularity and affordability.
Projects.funweekDesc: A project week packed with workshops, discussions, and interactive competitions aimed at fostering self-confidence, authenticity, and respect for diversity among middle school students.
Projects.underpineDesc: An original psychological horror game. The story takes us to the freezing Scandinavian mountains, specifically to the isolated Underpine Valley.
